doc.title: Bill Boyce: Money Actor
doc.plot: In this documentary, viewers meet a fascinating actor and athlete, still going strong after a career that stretches all the way back to the days of live television. Bill Boyce: Money Actor brings back not only the last days of Hollywood's golden age, but also recalls cult figures like director James Landis and alt-classic films like Rat Fink, The Sadist, and the one for which Bill will always be remembered, The Slime People.
